prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Robert Whitehead, Accession #6409-b, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was an archival transfer to the University of Virginia Library on 1974 July 8.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists entirely of papers from Whitehead's legal office in Lovingston, Nelson Co., Va. Almost half of the papers deal with the collection of unpaid bills by his firms S.B. and Robert Whitehead, and Whitehead and Marshall. The remainder contains legal notices, deeds, depositions given in a divorce suit and a land inheritance suit, receiver's reports, decrees of the Nelson Country Court and orders of the Nelson County Board of Supervisors as well as miscellaneous papers, bills and receipts.

did.unittitle: Correspondence concerning account collection by Whitehead's firm 1923-1936

Correspondence and Legal Documents re: Estate of Henry Bowman 1929

Transcripts of Testimony given in case of Rebecca and Walter Bruce of Nelson County and William Brown vs. Mary Harvey. 1931
Decrees of the Nelson County. Circuit Court 1931-1932
Miscellaneous Documents of the Circuit Court of Nelson County. 1932-1933
Report of Receivers in the Circuit Court of Nelson County. 1932-1933
Papers concerning the Nelson Coounty Board of Supervisors [1932-1933]
Decree of the Court concerning the Eliza G. Horsley Estate n. d.
